english.segment1: Mountains and valleys. The ups and the downs I go through. I will rejoice in You, Jesus. No matter the view
english.segment2: So I'm singing out. From the depths of my heart. I'm singing out. At the top of my lungs
english.segment3: I'm in love with You. 'Cause canyons will echo my voice. Screaming Hallelujah. Oh, what a beautiful noise
english.segment4: Glory to God in the highest. From down here below. Jesus my Savior, Your name. Is the sound of my hope
english.segment5: So I'm singing out. From the depths of my heart. I'm singing out. At the top of my lungs, lifting You high
english.segment6: I'm in love with You. 'Cause canyons will echo my voice. Screaming Hallelujah. Oh, what a beautiful noise
english.segment7: The sound of Your name. I long to hear. It's music to my ears. I'm in love with You
english.segment8: 'Cause canyons will echo my voice. Screaming Halle, Hallelujah
english.segment9: I'm in love with You. 'Cause canyons will echo my voice. Screaming Hallelujah
english.segment10: Oh, I'm in love with You. 'Cause canyons will echo my voice. Screaming Hallelujah. Oh, what a beautiful noise. Oh, what a beautiful noise
english.segment11: What a beautiful noise. What a beautiful noise.
